basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Julien Tissidre. I'm 44 years old, a father of 2 children aged 11 and 6, and I live in Agen, Nouvelle Aquitaine. I work as a senior manager at a regional bank, where I hold the position of Head of Credit Production. I joined this wonderful company at the age of 18 and completed all my studies there through apprenticeships and internal programs (ITB, Kedge). I've worked in almost all roles in the branches, then transitioned to a role as the manager of an online branch before creating an online consumer credit distribution platform. For the past 4 years, I've been responsible for the Credit expert teams (back and middle office). I've just completed the diploma program in Web Development at OpenClassrooms. It's more of a personal challenge than a professional one, and I see this training as an opportunity to better understand this field that I'm passionate about!... and who knows... maybe even more... The future belongs to those who dare...!

projects.title: Booki
projects.description: Project 2 of the OpenClassrooms Web Developer program: Integration of a FIGMA mockup to create a responsive static website in HTML and CSS. The project is to create the homepage of a lodging reservation website.

projects.title: Sophie Bluel
projects.description: Project 3 of the OpenClassrooms Web Developer program: Create a dynamic web page with JavaScript. Use JavaScript to create a dynamic web page. The project is to create a web page for a photographer. Use API requests to fetch data and display it dynamically on the web page. Filter data based on search criteria. Handle JavaScript events. Create a login page and manage authentication. Create modal windows. Add data via a form.

projects.title: Nina Carducci
projects.description: Project 5 of the OpenClassrooms Web Developer program: Debug and optimize a photographer's website. Use Google Lighthouse. Optimize the website globally, both in terms of performance and SEO. Implement local SEO using Schema.org. Add meta tags for social media. Optimize website accessibility. Fix JavaScript bugs and produce an optimization report.

projects.title: Pokedex
projects.description: Creating a Pokedex with React. An online course by Simon Dieny. To test: username: pikachu / password: pikachu

projects.title: Kasa
projects.description: Project 6 of the OpenClassrooms Web Developer program: Develop a web-based real estate rental application with React. Initialize a new React project with React-create-app. Set up routing with react-router-dom. Create application components and pages. Create a carousel and collapse. Use Sass for style management.

projects.title: Mon vieux Grimoire
projects.description: Project 7 of the OpenClassrooms Web Developer program: Develop the backend of a book rating web application. Use Express to create a REST API. Use MongoDB to store data. Use Mongoose to create data models. Use Multer to handle incoming files. Use Bcrypt to encrypt passwords. Use JsonWebToken to secure data. Use Nodemon for easier development. Project follows Green Code best practices with image size management via Sharp.

education.company: University of Pau et Pays de l'Adour
education.title: DUT in Sales Techniques
Baccalaureate in Economics and Social Sciences
